description:
Having been taken to the tatami room as punishment, Kamitsuki is first presented with the challenge of Joumou karuta.  Outsiders are unable to recite all 44 by heart.  However, Todoroki arrives at the last second and issues a different challenge: feeding Kamitsuki grilled sweet buns.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gunma Is Shaped Like a Crane in Flight
Gunma a la forme d`une grue qui danse
つる舞う形のグンマ県
